name: emi.wms
description: The Workload Management System (WMS) comprises a set of Grid middleware components responsible for the distribution and management
releaseNotes:
WMS UI 3.6.2:

setting umask 0077 breaks glite-wms-job-submit

WMS server 3.6.6:

WMProxy deletes a user delegated proxy on list-match operation

Broken CE causes a WMS to become very slow dealing with all other jobs
changeLog:
